1620700.name: DemonPandemicVR
1620700.description:
Our virtual reality exclusive, DemonPandemicVR, will satisfy your urge for a polished, casual VR experience. Built from the ground-up with comfort and casual players in mind, you can choose between a variety of options including your reload method of choice. Everything in DemonPandemicVR was made for VR, by VR experts.
DemonPandemicVR includes the following:
- Singleplayer
- 100+ Characters
- Arcade and realism reloading
- 7 arenas
- Seated or standing mode
- Variety of weapons
- Throw in game objects to kill demons
- Built for everyone (No bloodshed or NSFW)
1620700.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
